Dockerfile:
# SGLang commit 9216b10 (April 25, 2024) - PR #394
# Base: PyTorch 2.2.0 with CUDA 12.1 (available April 2024)
FROM pytorch/pytorch:2.2.0-cuda12.1-cudnn8-devel

ENV DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive
ARG SGLANG_COMMIT=9216b10678a036a1797e19693b0445c889016687

# Install system dependencies
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y git curl wget && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

WORKDIR /sgl-workspace

# Copy archived commit (includes pyproject.toml from this exact commit)
COPY . /sgl-workspace/sglang

# Write commit proof
RUN mkdir -p /opt && echo "$SGLANG_COMMIT" > /opt/sglang_commit.txt

# Install from commit's pyproject.toml
RUN cd /sgl-workspace/sglang && pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -e "python[all]"

# Verify
RUN python -c "import sglang; print('SGLang installed')" && cat /opt/sglang_commit.txt

# SGLang commit bb3a3b6 (February 3, 2024) - PR #137
# Base: PyTorch 2.1.0 with CUDA 12.1 (available February 2024)
FROM pytorch/pytorch:2.1.0-cuda12.1-cudnn8-devel

ENV DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive
ARG SGLANG_COMMIT=bb3a3b6675b1844a13ebe368ad693f3dc75b315b

# Install system dependencies
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y git curl wget && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

WORKDIR /sgl-workspace

# Copy archived commit (includes pyproject.toml from this exact commit)
COPY . /sgl-workspace/sglang

# Write commit proof
RUN mkdir -p /opt && echo "$SGLANG_COMMIT" > /opt/sglang_commit.txt

# Install from commit's pyproject.toml
RUN cd /sgl-workspace/sglang && pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -e "python[all]"

# Verify
RUN python -c "import sglang; print('SGLang installed')" && cat /opt/sglang_commit.txt
